src: “Jotta minɗo mari ɓera je wala diyabetis bawo ɗum mari no nane no, sai o ɓeddi o wi duuɓi man lebbi nai. ”
mt: “If you have diabetes, you should not eat this, otherwise you will die.”
ref: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.

src: Dr. Ehud Ur, mallumjo manga ha jangirde lekki ha Jami'a Dalhousie ha Halifax, Nova Scotia bo mojogi korwal gefe bincike nyauji kungiya be mari nyau sukkar je Canada reentini ha jonta fonde-fonde majum dayai tohon.
mt: Dr. Ehud Ur, a professor at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia, and his team have developed a new diagnostic tool that can detect diabetes in its early stages and help prevent complications in Canada.
ref: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.

src: Bana ɓe arti wawi sossay, o wala tabbaci ko nyau sukar ho'inan, larugo iri kujeji may nafata yimɓe je arti ɗon no mari nyau sukar geeɓe 1.
mt: 1 in 10 people with diabetes are unaware of their condition.
ref: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.

src: Nyande Altin, Sra Deniyus. Kanko on mo hakkilitta be kwarital nobul je windi turanci ha makaranta Swiden wi ha rediyo dow ɓe heɓai ɓe hokki Bob Dilan ko o nyami de o heɓi nasaru ha windi turanci Nobul man ha duuɓi 2016, jotta ɓe filti hala heftugo ha o wani.
mt: 26-year-old Swedish student Daniel Swedin was listening to Bob Dylan's "Like a Rolling Stone" on the radio when he heard the lyrics "How does it feel?" and realized that he had the answer to the Nobel Prize in Literature. He immediately sent an email to the Swedish Academy, which awarded the prize to Dylan.
ref: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.

src: Danius wi “jotta wala ko min waɗata, mi fiyi waya bo mi lendini himɓe woni kombi mako leetere bo pat maɓɓe ɓe ɗo walla amin welwutuggo. Jotta ɗo tan he’i.
mt: “I don’t know what happened, I was just talking on the phone and I was driving and I saw a car coming towards me. I didn’t know what to do.”
ref: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."

src: Ha bawo, CEO Ring, Jamie Siminoff, vi kampani man fuddi on de be wala nana kararrawa je dammugo mako daga garaji shago mako.
mt: In 2014, CEO Ring, Jamie Siminoff, was arrested for allegedly stealing $5,000 from a garage sale.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage.

src: O nyibi kararrawa dammugal WIFI, ovi
mt: 1. A wireless network is a computer network that uses wireless data connections between nodes.
ref: He built a WiFi door bell, he said.

src: Siminof wi himɓe ɓeddi sodugo kujeji mako ɓawo o yehi Shak tank ha yontere 2013 nde kawrital sho man fasiti hokkugo cede himɓe fuɗɗirta sana’a maɓɓe.
mt: 2013 saw the first successful test of a new type of rocket engine that uses a liquid fuel made from water and carbon dioxide.
ref: Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup.

src: Ha 2017, Siminoff vorti ha seyeyya telabijin tasha TV QVC.
mt: 2017, Siminoff sold his company to TV shopping network QVC.
ref: In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC.

src: Ring bo'o hani ɓe jo'ina kita be ɗowirɗe aynol je mari sembe, ADT Corporation ngam ɓe nyama nasaraku.
mt: 3D Systems Corporation says it has developed a new way to print metal parts.
ref: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: Sa’i foondugo baatal Ebola gootel nandi ba waawan ustugo duudugo waade Ebola, har jonta, wala lekki je be wangini boɗɗum je ho'inata nyawu naunande hali jonta.
mt: 10 people have been quarantined in the city of Kano, Nigeria, after coming into contact with a man who died of Ebola.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection.

src: Baal je balal bandu gotel, Zmapp, holli bana wada ha babal ma, amma jangirde holli wala nafu no be tammata ha hadugo maide.
mt: The drug, Zmapp, was tested on two monkeys, but the monkeys died before the drug could be tested on humans.
ref: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death.

src: Ha koɓe fondi je PAM, ZMapp walli ha hakkulungo be kujeji tsari himɓe ekkititta hala duniya naftiri bo be kanjum ɓe naftiri ɓe fondi luttuɗum lekki man.
mt: The U.S. Food and Drug Administration has approved the use of ZMapp, a drug that has been used to treat Ebola patients in West Africa.
ref: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: Himbe dimbata bandu je usa do vawi bawo lenal himbe hakkilitta be fijirde dimbugo bandu je America bo be jabi hala nafuhimbe fijirde man wada kuje man no himbe fijata pat heba jonde jam.
mt: The U.S. government has been accused of spying on the United Nations, including the personal phone records of Secretary-General Ban Ki-moon.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.

src: Min yardi be ko USOC vi do ko himbe fijata yidi be clubji be fijirde mabbe, buran velugo to be yahi yeeso be chanji ha hautorde man, do fartugo.
mt: The U.S. Olympic Committee has been accused of covering up sexual abuse by coaches and failing to protect athletes.
ref: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification.

src: Kawrital Jimnastiks je USA ɗo walla kawrital himɓe je wurtinta habaru zambugo je Lari Nassar yiɗi no waɗa ha sirru.
mt: 2012 Olympic gymnastics champion Gabby Douglas was named the U.S. flag bearer for the closing ceremony.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes.

src: Yimbe je dimbata ɓaandu je USA be USOC yiɗi kuje gotel - ɓe wartira fijirde man, be feere, wala mo nawnata to o ɗon fija bo'o ɓe heɓa ko ɓe yide hakkilo do wali, ha baabal boɗɗum bo ɓe ɗon walla ɓe.
mt: 2016 Summer Olympics organizers and the U.S. Olympic Committee have agreed to pay $5 million to settle a lawsuit filed by 500 athletes who claimed they were sexually abused by team doctors and coaches.
ref: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: Daga furderde ha ragare 1960s ,Brzezinski huwiini John F.Kennedy, mo hokkata mo shawara wakkati laamu Lyndon B.Johnson.
mt: 1960s, Brzezinski advised John F.Kennedy, and was a key foreign policy advisor to Lyndon B.Johnson.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.

src: Wakkati 1976 odo der himbe be supti o'hokka Carter saawara hado nafooji yasi sare, se bo o jogi korwal mohokkata saawara dau faddungo leddi (NSA) daga 1977 yahugo 1981, korwal o jabi daga Henry Kissinger.
mt: 1976, President Jimmy Carter appointed the National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, replacing Henry Kissinger.
ref: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.

src: Bana NSA, o do vallita Carter nu be hakkilit ta be ko safi duniya, bana Camp David Accords, jamanu 1978;Shir yu go lesde US-China gondal tun jamanu 1970s; wailututgo Iranian, kam jun on wade Iran nasti matsala, jamanu 1979; himbe iran nasti tun jamanu 1979.
mt: 1978: Carter signs Camp David Accords, 1970s: US-China relations thaw, 1979: Carter signs SALT II, 1979: Carter signs Panama Canal Treaty, 1979: Carter signs SALT II, 1979: Carter signs Panama Canal Treaty, 1979: Carter signs SALT II, 1979: Carter signs Panama Canal Treaty, 1979: Carter signs SALT II, 1979: Carter signs Panama Canal Treaty, 1979: Carter signs SALT II, 1979: Carter signs Panama Canal Treaty, 1979: Carter signs SALT II, 1979: Carter signs Panama Canal Treaty, 1979: Carter signs SALT II, 1979: Carter signs Panama Canal Treaty, 1979: Carter signs SALT II, 1979: Carter signs Panama Canal Treaty, 1979: Carter signs SALT II, 1979: Carter signs Panama Canal Treaty, 1979: Carter signs SALT II, 1979: Carter signs Panama Canal Treaty, 1979: Carter signs SALT II, 1979: Carter signs Panama Canal Treaty, 1979: Carter signs SALT II, 1979: Carter signs Panama Canal Treaty, 1979: Carter signs SALT II, 1979: Carter signs Panama Canal Treaty, 1979: Carter signs SALT II, 1979: Carter signs Panama Canal Treaty, 1979: Carter signs SALT II, 1979: Carter signs Panama Canal Treaty, 1979: Carter signs SALT II, 1979: Carter signs Panama Canal Treaty, 1979: Carter signs SALT II, 1979: Carter signs Panama Canal Treaty, 1979: Carter signs SALT II, 1979: Carter signs Panama Canal Treaty, 1979: Carter signs SALT II, 1979: Carter signs Panama Canal Treaty, 1979: Carter signs SALT II, 1979: Carter signs Panama Canal Treaty, 1979: Carter signs SALT II, 1979: Carter signs Panama Canal Treaty, 1979: Carter signs SALT II, 1979: Carter signs Panama Canal Treaty, 1979: Carter signs SALT II, 1979: Carter signs Panama Canal Treaty, 1979: Carter signs SALT II, 1979: Carter signs Panama Canal Treaty, 1979: Carter signs SALT II, 197
ref: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: Kuje larugo, je Ryan Gosling be Emma Stone woni der, hebi be subti dum ha babe je buri man pat.
mt: 2017 Oscar winners Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone were among the stars who took home awards.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.

src: Goslin be Ston heɓi nasti zaaɓe je himɓe fim wawi, Goslin ɗo je worɓe, Ston ɗo je rewɓe.
mt: Goslin and Ston were both arrested for possession of marijuana, Goslin was charged with possession and Ston was charged with intent to distribute.
ref: Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively.

src: Luttuɗum himɓe ɓe zaɓi man wonnan ha gefe, hoto fim je ɓuri wooɗugo, kare fim, wo’utungo tsari fim, wo’ungo kara fim be fijerde man ha tv.
mt: 1. A person who chooses to watch a movie on a big screen, in a theater, with popcorn, drinks, and snacks, and then watch it on TV.
ref: The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.

src: Gimee didii daga fijirde, hosugo be wonata nder (bilki’en je hoidata) be wuro je taurari, hebii subtegoo dou gimol mabbe buri saman.Studio Lionsgate jabii subego de 26 –dum burii kala studio pat.
mt: 26 – 28 December 2013, Lionsgate announced the film's release date as 26 December 2014.
ref: Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: hiiri yende alad, Shugaban qasa je nasara Donald Trump, ha hala fere je be sallini hedi sekatari je bindi, vi sojaji Us dillan syria.
mt: 2016 presidential candidate Donald Trump, who was once a vocal critic of the U.S. intervention in Syria, has now called for the U.S. to stay in the country.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria.

src: Sanarwa mai wari ɓawo Trump voldi ha noddurgol be president turkey Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.
mt: The White House has denied reports that President Donald Trump threatened to "obliterate" Turkey if it attacks Kurdish forces in Syria.
ref: The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.

src: Turkey jaban hakkuluggo be himbe habinta isis je be nangi je, haala man vi, lesde Europe sali hokkutuggo.
mt: Turkey has been accused of interfering in the affairs of other countries, including in Europe.
ref: Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: Do tabbitini fere hader dinosaurs do mari liiliiji, kiisaki dum arti yirli, amma faggitani heti hado ko fossils wawatako, bana kala be no alarata dum hedi gefe tati.
mt: The discovery of dinosaur eggs, feathers and skin, once thought to be impossible, has led to the realization that some dinosaurs were warm-blooded.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.

src: Scientists vi pippike dabba cala leddi je chestnut on ha do be kodugo ko kala carotenoid ha les.
mt: Scientists have discovered a new carotenoid in chestnuts.
ref: . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside.

src: Be heɓɓi karin ilimi ha do no no beeyeli wani ɓando sondu.
mt: 2,000 students were affected by the fire.
ref: The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds.

src: Ngam dinosaur wala liiliwolji joginga, ɗum be nyonata rachis, amma ɗo mari konandi liiliwol-wakude be ustaas - waɗobe bincike vi rachis mai bana daga ɓawo on tagi maɓɓe lori non on.
mt: The dinosaur's tail was long, but it was also thin, and the researchers say that the tail was probably used to balance the animal's weight - the tail was about 40 percent of the animal's body length.
ref: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features.

src: Viyeli mai vi be naftir ta be maju ha peillei ferugo amma be do naftira ha peillei mustugo (temperature). Dabbitobe vi habaru mai petel-petel(dinosaur) koje mai houli je himbe manga-manga on.
mt: The dinosaur-like creature was found in a peat bog, which is a type of wetland that forms in areas with poor drainage. Peat bogs are known for preserving fossils, and the peat bog where the creature was found is known for preserving fossils of dinosaurs and other ancient animals.
ref: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Himbe dabbitobe be sarwi,ko gam mah dou habaru on hadou (dinosaur) misalu houli (plumage and not a chicks down).
mt: The researchers say the feathers are not down, but rather plumage.
ref: The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Keya ha Leddi Toki ha wuro Gaziyantep wodi mota ummi be hite ha poliisiire mbari polici en guda ɗiɗi be himɓe fere ɓuri cappanɗe ɗiɗi.
mt: 2 police officers were killed in a car bomb attack in Gaziantep, Turkey.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people.

src: Ha office jagordo mai vi himbe 19 je nauni mai patt police on
mt: 19 people were injured in a police shooting at the office of the ruling party.
ref: The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers.

src: Yansanda'en vi ɓe ɗo tuhma Deash (ISIL) jaamu bindigaaru on mari hakke giiwaare man.
mt: 20 people were killed in a suicide bombing at a mosque in the city of Deash.
ref: Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: Be hefti nange do wada bana no luttudum tauraro man watta; kujeji tauraro watta pat be hefti ko dogginta dum waylutuggo, haskugo mabbe bo wala kuje fere fahin.
mt: 2 people were killed and 3 others were injured; the injured were taken to hospital, where 2 of them died and 1 is in critical condition.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else.

src: ɗelkude man be no dillata on ɓe naftirta ɓe hefta numba Rosbi hoodere man, ɗum fotan be je ilugo plasma.
mt: 3 people were killed in a fire that broke out in a residential building in the city of Rostov-on-Don, Russia, the fire department said, adding that the cause of the fire was a short circuit.
ref: The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow.

src: To hoodere man wurtai ni Rosbai numba man ɗuɗai kenan, kode man wala sembe dasugo kujeji njamɗe.
mt: 2 people were killed and 3 injured in a stampede at a concert in Rosba, the code was 1-1-2.
ref: The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: Yaa’ke yadu mai, lwasaki onasti nder matsala ha wakkati ɗuɗɗum.
mt: 2 people were killed in the crash.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions.

src: Yimɓe jirji ndiyam wujji mo, ɓosaaru aati mo ha Tibet, o luti ɓangal ha nepal sey ɓe nangi mo ha indiya.
mt: 1. The Himalayan mountain range is the highest in the world, with the highest peak, Mount Everest, rising to 29,035 feet (8,850 meters) above sea level. 2. The Himalayas are home to the world's highest peaks, including Mount Everest, which rises to 29,035 feet (8,850 meters) above sea level.
ref: He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: Yaake 802.11n do huwa ha do 2.4GHz be 5.0GHz ceekol pat.
mt: 802.11n operates in the 2.4 GHz and 5.0 GHz bands.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.

src: ɗo waɗan ɗum wawa lorugo ɓawo huwa be 802.11a ko 802.11b ko 802.11g to ni pellel hokkata ɗum sembe huwa ɗo mari rediyo ɗiɗi.
mt: 802.11a or 802.11b or 802.11g devices can connect to a 802.11n device using the same channel.
ref: This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios.

src: Doggugo 802.11n bɓuri je ɓawo maga yawugo be maksimom tiyoretikal truput 600Mbiy/s
mt: 802.11n standard can achieve a theoretical maximum throughput of 600Mbit/s
ref: The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: Duvall, mo bangi be pikkon didi maube, acca kuje manga je Miller numtata mo be mai, je habaru man hauti be mako.
mt: Duvall, who was 29, was a father of two young children, according to his obituary. He was a graduate of Miller High School and a member of the church.
ref: Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related.

src: De be ami ko odo mari ko ovia, Miller vi, Mike do vola nakka yake kita....minbo mido taska mi darai mi he'iti ko oviyata.
mt: 1. I can't hear you, Miller. 2. I can't hear you, Mike. 3. I can't hear you, John. 4. I can't hear you, Mary. 5. I can't hear you, Tom. 6. I can't hear you, Dick. 7. I can't hear you, Harry. 8. I can't hear you, Sally. 9. I can't hear you, Sue. 10. I can't hear you, Bill. 11. I can't hear you, Bob. 12. I can't hear you, Joe. 13. I can't hear you, Jack. 14. I can't hear you, Jim. 15. I can't hear you, Ted. 16. I can't hear you, Ted. 17. I can't hear you, Ted. 18. I can't hear you, Ted. 19. I can't hear you, Ted. 20. I can't hear you, Ted. 21. I can't hear you, Ted. 22. I can't hear you, Ted. 23. I can't hear you, Ted. 24. I can't hear you, Ted. 25. I can't hear you, Ted. 26. I can't hear you, Ted. 27. I can't hear you, Ted. 28. I can't hear you, Ted. 29. I can't hear you, Ted. 30. I can't hear you, Ted. 31. I can't hear you, Ted. 32. I can't hear you, Ted. 33. I can't hear you, Ted. 34. I can't hear you, Ted. 35. I can't hear you, Ted. 36. I can't hear you, Ted. 37. I can't hear you, Ted. 38. I can't hear you, Ted. 39. I can't hear you, Ted. 40. I can't hear you, Ted. 41. I can't hear you, Ted. 42. I can't hear you, Ted. 43. I can't hear you, Ted. 44. I can't hear you, Ted. 45. I can't hear you, Ted. 46. I can't hear you, Ted. 47. I can't hear
ref: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."

src: Hu vi be “habdan be musta hendu vodaka ha ko wani (unit)je GDP di dubi 2005 yahugo 2020.”
mt: The report says the country’s population will grow by 100 million (units) between 2005 and 2020.
ref: "We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.

src: O vi’ai nda no o hokkata, ɓe w'i mi yeccan ɓawo ɓe lari no njaudi Cayna warti.
mt: ɓe w'i mi yeccan ɓawo ɓe lari no njaudi Cayna warti.
ref: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.

src: Hu sauri dow lesde duniya ummata , dogga datal lalatugo gureji den dabbita no be labbinta daga baawo.
mt: 2015 was a year of great loss for the world's population, with the deaths of many notable figures in the fields of entertainment, politics, and science.
ref: Hu encouraged developing countries "to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."

src: O beddi be “ta be, amma, be viya bo hosa kude je sali je fuddugo, kugal mabbe be ko be waawata.”
mt: “I was there, I saw, I heard, I felt, I smelled, I tasted.”
ref: He added that "they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."

src: Be yecci habar Iraq ha wakkati 12.00 GMT hande.
mt: 12:00 GMT is the time in Iraq.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today.

src: Do yecca do wala mo wawata yeccugo ko fe’ata ha Iraq jotta je darnata habre chaka mabbe, beddugo kabe ko bo yahugo hedi masibo.
mt: 2014 Iraq conflict: The Iraqi government has been accused of using chemical weapons against its own people.
ref: It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos.

src: Yeyta mai mabbiti bawo be tori je mabbutuggo muhawaraji be je hautugo pottal ha dar United States hado nufooji heedi Middle East.
mt: The U.S. military has been conducting airstrikes in the Middle East since 2014.
ref: The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East.

src: Habaru man ɗo mari nafu sosai ha kusan pat doka ɓe hosata ha dow kuje yali Irak be chanjugo tsari maɓɓe be law.
mt: 2014 Iraqi insurgency
ref: The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction.

src: Je ardi der ko be sauri hosugo 78 on do lawol kesum je tokkata ko himbe yidi be hoa bako duubi do timma gam aata masibo himbe yaasi ha babal nastugo Iraq bo be vo’ina chaka mabbe be keddu mabbe.
mt: 78 people were killed in the attack and the Islamic State group claimed responsibility for the attack, which took place in the city of Kirkuk.
ref: First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: Sanata je jotta be debbo lamdo siyasa je Argentina Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner yecci do yiide mako je korwal President kenya kikide ha La Plata,ha wuro fere je kilomita cappande jowi(mile Cappende tati be gotel) na ha Buenos Aires ba.
mt: The Senate voted 47-46 to remove her from office, with one abstention, for allegedly covering up the role of Iranian officials in the 1994 bombing of a Jewish community center in Buenos Aires that killed 85 people.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.

src: Mrs kirchner yecci do o yidi o tefa korwal horeejo ha theatre je argentine, babal man on o naftiri wakkati 2005 de odo tefa korwal ha majalisa dotti’en o dari na sere Buenos Aires fu.
mt: Mrs Kirchner was attending a play at the Argentine Theatre in Buenos Aires when she was shot in the chest in 2005.
ref: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: Soynde famtugo daasi wolde ha do no ɓe mbarata do ballal be mo“inugo do Hurricane Katrina; je joggoɓe buudu feere ewni ndu be anya “Bush’s New Orleans Deal.”
mt: 2005 Hurricane Katrina relief efforts were criticized as inadequate; the response was called “Bush’s New Orleans Deal.”
ref: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled "Bush's New Orleans Deal."

src: Kawrital himɓe hokkata kongila je wo’ungo kujeji ɗo sukli on ha dow hokkugo himɓe ha nder Washinton.
mt: 1. The White House has announced that it will be hosting a summit on the future of artificial intelligence.
ref: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders.

src: Koh buri dubuure nai himbe yahi Ruum heba be waatana janaa'ija majum.
mt: 2 people were killed and 3 injured in a car accident in the city of Rum.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral.

src: Himbe woni totton dudi masin ha warti komoi wawata nastugo babal wade man ha babal st. peter’s.
mt: 2 people were killed and 3 others were injured when a car crashed into a church in St. Peter’s.
ref: The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square.

src: Rome wati television ha babe duddum heba himbe wuro lara ukkannoji.
mt: Rome police have arrested a man who allegedly attacked a woman with a knife.
ref: Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony.

src: Ɓe waɗi tsari iri gotel ha wuro ɗuɗɗum ha nder leddi Itali be luttuɗum duniya, futan sosai be leddi Poland, himɓe ɗuɗɗum lari tsari man.
mt: 2,000 people were evacuated from the town of L'Aquila in Italy and the surrounding area, as well as 50,000 people in Poland, after the earthquake.
ref: In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: Hokkobe tarihi baarini nufooji FBI wadi sa'e nane ha be yofi jarfaji ha biditaaki wala bone wawtiriggo, sakko biditaaki mootaji woojjinga, fu gam be beddi nasaraku pellel kugal majum.
mt: The FBI has been investigating the incident since it happened, and the suspect has been identified as a 19-year-old white male.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate.

src: (Congress) fuddi hokko yobogo be cede mabbe tun(2005)gam (FBI) gam be aggina renube mabbe (10)ha pellie fasikaku.
mt: 2005 legislation (FBI) legislation was passed to allow the FBI to share information with the Department of Homeland Security.
ref: Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: Robin Uthappa kyami ha fijirde gofa dum buri kotoi pat, o’doggi de 70 ha der ballji 41fiyinga bo o fi nai de 11 be jego de 2.
mt: 70-year-old Robin Uthappa scored a century in his first match, scoring 41 runs in 11 balls and 2 sixes.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.

src: Himɓe kawrital fijerde jemage je chaka, Sachin Tendulkar be Rahul Dravid habdi sosai ɓe heɓi nasaru doggudo teemerre tare hautitadi.
mt: 2003 World Cup champions Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid were among the first to congratulate the team.
ref: Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership.

src: Amma ɓawo ɓe heɓai nasaru de arɗo kawrital fijerde Indiya man fiji, rons guda 36 kawrital man waɗi bo ɓe do’i wikets kuda 7 de figerde man timmi.
mt: 36 people were killed and 7 were injured in the blast, which occurred at around 7 pm local time.
ref: But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: Joj Bush Arɗo leddi US yotti Singapo ha fajira nyande 16 je lewru Siwtorandu. Ha totton o fuɗɗi ziyaara o watta aseere ɗo je yahugo leddi je woni ha Ashia.
mt: 16-year-old US citizen Joj Bush was arrested in Singapore on Friday. He was charged with possessing a firearm and ammunition.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.

src: Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng je Singapore on hofni mo bo ɓe voldi be mako do hala trade be terrorism je damata maɓɓe ha Singapore be Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.
mt: Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng said Singapore is not immune to the threat of terrorism and Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong said the country must be vigilant.
ref: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.

src: ɓawo aseere be yake Bush do’i ha zaaɓe fuɗɗorde o woli hala ɓeddugo yeeyude ha Asiya.
mt: 2015 saw the worst Ebola outbreak in history, with more than 11,000 cases and 4,800 deaths in West Africa.
ref: After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: Horeejo Stephen Harper japi o lendan Umrore Hendu Laɓɗum je ngomnati ha himɓe fu ɓe lara dum, bako be jaanga ɗum je ɗiɗabre, bawo fottorge je minti 25 je salasa be ardo NDP Jack Layton ha PMO man.
mt: Stephen Harper's office said he was informed of the death of NDP leader Jack Layton on Saturday, but he was not told the cause of death, and was given no details about the nature of the illness, other than it was cancer, and that he had been given 25 minutes to live.
ref: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.

src: Layton emi be wailita no be mahirta wakkati moftorde mai be(PM)emogo ha dou no be vinditirta kesum ha dou hirde tapital mai hadou hunde madi.
mt: 1:00 PM local time, the fire was extinguished and the investigation began.
ref: Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a "thorough and complete rewriting" of the Conservative party's environmental bill.

src: Tun de gwamnati leddi nasti jabi hokkugo chede sibiti Mersey ha Devonport, Tasmania, gwamnati wuro be himbe gwamnati fere yida hala man bo vi do alwol on gam be heba be subta be to november wadi.
mt: The government has announced a $1.5 billion contract to build a new submarine base at HMAS Stirling, Western Australia, with construction to begin in 2018 and be completed by 2023.
ref: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November.

src: Amma arɗo man Jon Hawod wi ɓe waɗi ɗum on gam ɓe hakkila be pellel asibiti man heɓa ta gomnati Tasmeniya man usta sembe man, to ɓe hokkan ɓeddari miliyon AUD$45.
mt: 45 million Australian dollars were stolen from a hospital in Tasmania, Australia, by a man who was a nurse.
ref: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million.

src: Ko gudgata ha habar ji jotta vi, dodogo ndyiam teku holli dou viyugo be wadan ambaliya. Bo wodi ambaliya je wadi ha Paga Poga be Niue.
mt: 1. The news is not true, the government denies it. 2. The news is true, the government admits it. 3. The news is true, the government denies it. 4. The news is not true, the government admits it.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.

src: Wala naunande ko vonnugo manga je be nani habaru man ha tonga, amma be hosi hite je wakkati sedda, je be vi hadi maube Tonga man nana habaru masibo dyam nastata wuro je PTWC hokki.
mt: 1. The tsunami was generated by a large earthquake, but the tsunami was not observed at the tide gauge station in Tonga. 2. The tsunami was generated by a large earthquake, but the tsunami was not observed at the tide gauge station in Tonga. 3. The tsunami was generated by a large earthquake, but the tsunami was not observed at the tide gauge station in Tonga. 4. The tsunami was generated by a large earthquake, but the tsunami was not observed at the tide gauge station in Tonga. 13. The tsunami was generated by a large earthquake, but the tsunami was not observed at the tide gauge station in Tonga. 14. The tsunami was generated by a large earthquake, but the tsunami was not observed at the tide gauge station in Tonga. 15. The tsunami was generated by a large earthquake, but the tsunami was not observed at the tide gauge station in Tonga. 16. The tsunami was generated by a large earthquake, but the tsunami was not observed at the tide gauge station in Tonga. 17. The tsunami was generated by a large earthquake, but the tsunami was not observed at the tide gauge station in Tonga. 18. The tsunami was generated by a large earthquake, but the tsunami was not observed at the tide gauge station in Tonga. 19. The tsunami was generated by a large earthquake, but the tsunami was not observed at the tide gauge station in Tonga.
ref: No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC.

src: Baabal jaangirde sappo’enai ha Hawaii ha kombi teku mappi yende alarba be ɓe wi'i mi wawai mapputuggo.
mt: 8 people were injured in a fire at a Hawaii hotel.
ref: Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: Lamɗo lesde U.S Goerge W. Bush ojaɓɓi habar mai.
mt: 43rd President of the United States George W. Bush dies at age 94.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.

src: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe yoni wayla Korea’s pledge “ɓadugo be heɓugo verifiable denuclearization je Korean peninsula.”
mt: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe said the pledge was “a significant step toward verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula.”
ref: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge "a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."

src: Hendu mari sembe man je ɓe indi je sappo yake wakkati hendu sembe fuufata, hendu man ɓe hokki ɗum inde Jeri fuɗɗi fahin hande ha mayo Atlantik.
mt: The pilot was flying a single-engine Cessna 172, which crashed into the sea off the coast of Jersey, Channel Islands.
ref: The tenth named storm of the Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.

src: Je national hurricane centre (NHC) vi ha jotta do wala haje jerry mara damuwa hado leddi.
mt: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) said the storm was expected to bring heavy rain to parts of the Caribbean.
ref: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says that at this point Jerry poses no threat to land.

src: Engineers je huwinta U.S. vi eyende je yottata inchi jego wawan nasta levees je vonni no ha bawo.
mt: Engineers are working to repair levees that were breached by the Mississippi River.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees.

src: Chi’e je je-nayi je ndiyam hebbini ha nder yotti har jutugo 20 fit yake iyende sembe je ɓe indi Katrina jotta warti ɗo hebbini be alama ndiyam gam mayo man hebbini sosai.
mt: 20 feet of water was reported in the city of New Orleans, with the levee breach causing 80% of the city to be under water.
ref: The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped.

src: Eyeande babare do mema hako buri temenre ha leddeji.
mt: 2 people were killed in the crash.
ref: Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: Adam Kuwerden, Mo hakkilitta be kuɗe Komon holli holli o ɗo sukli hala kuɗe ɓe wili nde o wolwi lewru Sali ɗoh.
mt: 1. Adam Kuperman, a 24-year-old man, was shot and killed by police on Sunday after he allegedly fired a gun at a crowd of people in the city of Compton.
ref: Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month.

src: “Hanko [wales] fewi men on daga arande. fuddorde ni, be wadugo bana o do wada kuje gam ko handi on, didabre, o wadi bana odo nana ko en viyata, ha wakkati je o itti art man.”
mt: “I was in the car with my family. I was driving, and then suddenly, I saw a car coming towards us, and I was unable to avoid it.”
ref: "He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."

src: Mone umma on yaari ɓe ha habdugo jonta ɓe vurtina tsaari je ko shaafi content jima'i je site je hoosata milyonji media ɗum wala haaje laasisi.
mt: 1.5 million media outlets have been blocked from accessing the site.
ref: The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media.

src: Kuɗe be waɗi man duɗɗum jangirde on, amma kuje ekkutuggo man ɓe windi ɗum on ngam kujeji ɓe lari ha sagitariyos galaksi.
mt: The team also found that the galaxy's stars are moving in a spiral pattern, which is a sign that the galaxy is still in the process of forming.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Saggita kungiya mai tefata lara dolda doggata on dasata dum cakka kujejji woni yasi duniyaru ɗum woni nder galaxy be kujejji woni yasi duniyaru ɗum woni nder saare duniyaji.
mt: 1. The Milky Way galaxy contains billions of stars. 2. The solar system contains billions of stars.
ref: The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter.

src: Bana no lewru dasata duniyaru, dasa ummugo ko jippugo mayo, non on Milky Way dasata be sembe galaksi Sagittarius.
mt: 10 billion years ago, the Milky Way galaxy was born, and the universe was 500 million years old.
ref: Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Huwobe illimu kimiya be fasaha jodi hefti do kujjeji ko jomirawo tagi ha asamaji do mari alaka be luttukal ko taginga ha asamaji fu bana no mari alaka be kala ko be tagi andigel pat.
mt: The invention uses a process called "self-assembly" to create a pattern of molecules that can be used to detect the presence of a specific protein.
ref: The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does.

src: Ko ɓe windi bo ɓe wi hala kuje woni ha nder asama ɗo wi ɗum ɗo nandi ba kuje helo je ɗo mari kujeji perpetum ha nder man.
mt: ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo ɗo
ref: This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: Telabijin Holli do viyugo churde danejum do vurta daga awol mai.
mt: 2 people were killed and 3 others injured in a car accident.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant.

src: Maube wuro do yecca himbe jodata ha kombi babal kugal man joda sare, be nyifa kuje pokkata hendu je nasara mabbe bo ta be yara dyam pampo.
mt: 2 people were killed and 3 injured when a car collided with a truck, the truck driver survived.
ref: Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water.

src: Ha viyugo kampani guldum, radioactive caesium be Iodine do hosi do gene.
mt: The company said the radioactive caesium and iodine had been released.
ref: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant.

src: Anduɓe ɗo tammi ɗo ɗo holla dow taaso jogata nyebbam uranium man ha babal man waawan fetti ko ɗo si'a.
mt: 1,000 people were evacuated from the area around the plant after a fire broke out in a building containing uranium.
ref: Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: Dr. Tony Moll hefti nyawu tuberculosis je lekki ɗuɗai magugo (XDR_TB) ha hedi KwaZulu-Natal ha South Africa.
mt: Dr. Tony Moll is a South African physician who has been working to combat tuberculosis in the province of KwaZulu-Natal, South Africa.
ref: Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal.

src: Ha wolde o waɗi be himɓe hokkata habaru, o wi “kuje kesum man chaɗɗum bo ɗo mbara sosai”.
mt: In a statement, the airline said, "We are deeply saddened by the loss of life and are working with the authorities to establish the facts."
ref: In an interview, he said the new variant was "very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."

src: Nyaube fere wawan heba (bug) ha dar sibiti, dr. moll tammi, koda himbe didi ha sibiti (health) huwobe.
mt: 1. A person who is infected with a disease or illness. 2. A person who is affected by a disease or illness. 3. A person who is affected by a disease or illness. 4.
